description: Jurassic World Evolution is a series of video games based on the movie Jurassic World. In the Jurassic World Evolution games, players build and manage their own dinosaur parks, which can contain up to 40 types of dinosaurs and other animals.

Both Jurassic World Evolution and Jurassic World Evolution 2 contain a set of OVL files. These files are archives saved in a proprietary file format. They contain all the assets a game needs to show and animate a dinosaur, animal, or other object. The Steam version of Jurassic World stores OVL files at the following location:
While players are not meant to open or edit OVL files, Jurassic World Evolution modders have created a utility that allows them to extract assets from and add assets to OVL files.
